description: Test suite for the ViteTemplate in the universalinit project, including fixtures, project initialization, configuration loading, and template variable replacement.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration and template files.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a test project configuration object.

methods.name: test_vite_init_info
methods.description: Tests retrieval of initial template information.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process and output files.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Tests loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Checks template variable substitution in output files.
